before_you_start: You must be a UK resident and at least 17 years old to apply for a driving licence.
changes_made: Made the contact methods question mandatory
description: Fill out this form to apply for a driving licence in the UK. Ensure you provide accurate information.

questions.hint_text: Enter your full name as it appears on official documents
We will use this to contact you regarding your application

questions.question_text: What is your date of birth?

questions.hint_text: Select your preferred method of contact
questions.question_text: How would you like to be contacted?
questions.required_error_text: Select your preferred method of contact

detailed_explanation.explanation_text: Choosing 'Automatic' means you can drive vehicles that require automatic transmission. Choosing 'Manual' means you can drive vehicles that require manual transmission. You can [upgrade your licence from automatic to manual](https://www.gov.uk/automatic-driving-licence-to-manual) later.

questions.question_text: Do you prefer driving an automatic or manual vehicle?

questions.hint_text: Describe any relevant health issues in brief
questions.question_text: Do you have any health problems that may affect your driving? (optional)

title: Apply for a driving licence
what_happens_next: Your application will be reviewed, and you will be contacted via your preferred contact method with further information.
